name: CLP_NON_GRP_TX_IDS
description: This table stores claim print transaction IDs for Hospital Billing.

columns.name: CLAIM_PRINT_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the claim record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number of one of the multiple values associated with a specific group of data within this record.

columns.name: NON_GROUP_HTR_ID
columns.description: Stores charges that are active on the current claim.
